typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		InvoiceID as short,
		VendorID as short,
		InvoiceNumber as string,
		InvoiceDate as timestamp,
		InvoiceTotal as double,
		PaymentTotal as double,
		CreditTotal as double,
		TermsID as short,
		InvoiceDueDate as timestamp,
		PaymentDate as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> ReadInvoices
ReadInvoices alterRow(upsertIf(true())) ~> AlterRow1
